title: Will there be another Summoner Spell?
body: I have never seen another Summoner Spell being put in the game ever since I started playing the game. Will there ever be another spell being put in the game that would be used just as much as TP, Ignite, Heal, and Smite?

What if: 

* Barrier reduced AoE damage. 

* Clairvoyance revealed a section of the map for a long period of time. 

* Clarity gave true sight to affected champions. 

* Ghost increased Tenacity.

I would like to see them combine Barrier, Ghost, and Cleanse into one spell that makes you immune to damage, targeting, and CC while being incapable of dealing damage for a short time. (Like Zhonya's the summoner spell, except you can still move and use it while CC'ed)
Barrier and Cleanse have overlapping niches, and Ghost's niche is already covered by _a lot_ of other tools.
Bruh,not even Flash provides that kinda safety. Would be way over overpowered

That would be way too strong though - think about how ridiculous that would be in so many situations. It's get out of jail free card that even Zhonyas can't provide and would instantly ruin a lot of champions' abilities to do anything at crucial moments. 

Barrier has more of an overlapping niche with Heal than with Cleanse because you use Barrier primarily for mitigating damage. Heal is simply more useful because it helps your partner bottom lane and the MS boost takes you to safety or continues an engage. 

Cleanse is not effective anymore due to how accessible QSS for the champions that would use it. It's also not even as effective as QSS. Maybe if they gave it a speed boost like Merc Scimitar's Quicksilver.

For a whole 2.5 seconds, you sacrifice damage potential for unrestrained movement and safety. The CD I imagine would be 300 seconds, so just like Flash it would only be available every other fight. Unlike Flash, it would not allow immediate offensive opportunities.

Barrier has been made obsolete by Heal, Cleanse has been made obsolete due to QSS, and Ghost has been made mostly obsolete by power creep. This spell would cover all of their niches for defensive use and unrestrained movement. This game is hurting with how little anti-burst options there are, and how easy it is to get caught out by champions with mobility.
The only usage case I would consider problematic is that assassins pick it up for free escapes. However, carries would also pick it up in the first place to counter them, having assassins pick it up over Ignite is a good trade-off, and most problem champions could be balanced by nerfing their escapes and/or durability.

Mini Zhonya's? People already have problems with champions like Fizz, don't give him more invulnerability. The CDR SS would also be niche, but not the worst idea, so I've seen worse. The Thistle Tea is odd, and incredibly niche... 

The tankify SS also sounds like the board's definition of invisible power, since the enemy can no longer reliably calculate the damage they might be able to do to you, as well as a few other things, so I'd probably consider that a no-no. 

SS design is hard to prevent abuse cases on the level of Flash :\

Fizz would have to give up the kill pressure of Ignite or the escape potential of Flash, though (he already has a escape, but as Fizz he would rather be able to use his E more aggressively.

Even if you want to argue about Fizz, it's pretty hard to argue against someone like Vlad taking it, given that his secondary summoner is usually just whatever happens to be FotM because no other second summoner is really reliable on him, or synergizes amazingly with his kit, barring maybe Ghost. Honestly, though: I'm pretty sure Fizz wouldn't be too upset at losing Ignite in trade for even more safety. But, I suppose that's up to playstyle preference.
